text: Which device generates a password for each login?
note: Token generator is a small device given to the user. It generates a password for each log in and this password can be used only once.

text: The token generator uses ________ to generate OTP.
note: The token generator uses pseudorandomness or randomness to generate the OTP.

text: In which OTP does the system hash the password?
note: Hashed OTP is also known as HMAC-OTP or HOTP. In this mechanism, the system hashes the password and sends it over to the token generator represented as digits.

text: In ______, the generated password expires after a period of time, even if it is not used.
note: In TOTP, the OTP generated expires in a short amount of time, even if it was not used.
